1.content:
Zeke:- skateboarder. Best friends with Luther. Has a 32-34inch waist. Not particularly chubby but no visible abs on his stomach, which sticks out slightly.

Luther:- skateboarder. Best friends with zeke. Has a 28-30 inch waist. No visible abs but you can see where his ribs are and has a flat stomach.
1.title: Who gains?

choices: jeans that were a size too small and his silver studded belt
Jeans that were too loose and his silver studded belt
Jeans that fit and his silver studded belt
Jeans that fit and luther's lucky belt, which was quite tight to put on
Jeans that were small and luther's lucky belt, which was quite tight to put on
11.content: Kojo decided to trick zeke into getting too fat to skateboard so that he would be known as the best. He rang zeke and told him that he had decided that as well as skateboarding, eating was also a test of how awesome you are. Kojo challenged zeke to an eating contest at don's donuts. Zeke accepted, because if he didn't then kojo would never let it drop how "zeke the awesome" couldn't even accept an eating contest. Zeke turned up in:
11.title: Zeke

choices: Zeke ate half the food on his table
Zeke at all the food on his table.
113.content: Zeke was getting ready for the contest. He pulled on his favourite jeans, which were a perfect fit (that's why they were his favourite). He also put on his silver studded belt, because he had worn it when he nearly got eaten by dogs and he made it out alive, so he figured it was his lucky belt. It had 7 holes in it with silver around them and he fastened it comfortably in the tightest hole. He looked in the mirror and examined his butt. He thought his butt was great, and the jeans he was wearing showed it off. He then reallised he was going to be late for the contest, so he ran to get his skateboard and went straight to don's donuts. He got there to see a crowd of people around two tables, at one of which sat kojo. The other was empty, apart from trays of food. Little did zeke know, kojo had sprinkled a special powder over zekes food. The powder was designed to relieve the stomach of feeling full, allowing you to eat more. It also lowered metabolism, so zeke would gain weight faster.
113.title: Jeans that fit and his silver studded belt

choices: The next day he has trouble putting his shorts on
The next day his shirt is too tight
The next day the only belt that had fit him had vanished.
1132.content: Zeke had eaten all the food on his table when the effect of the powder wore off. He felt full, and his belt felt extremely tight. He looked down at his belly, which was pressing against his now tight shirt and threatening to pop the buttons off. He looked over to kojo to see that he had unbuckled his belt, so zeke saw that it would be ok for him to do the same. He unbuckled his belt and immediately it shot apart to the point that if he fastened it comfortably it would be 3 holes looser than before. He pushed his belly out to see how far he could, and the button popped off his jeans. The bottom 2 buttons also popped off his shirt, leaving his exposed belly hanging out. Kojo finally finished, but since zeke finished first, he had won.
1132.title: Zeke at all the food on his table.

choices: He went straight to his fridge
11321.content: The next morning he got out of bed and went to look in the mirror. The first thing he noticed was that his shirt had ridden up to his belly button, revealing a slight belly. He bent over to pick up an empty bag of chips and his pyjama pants split down the butt seam. He then noticed his butt had grown considerably, but he liked it. He liked his belly too. He got dressed, but when he got to his shorts he couldn't get the button fastened. He tried and tried, but he couldn't. He decided to go look in his dads wardrobe to find something to wear, but the biggest things he could find were a 34 inch waist. He measured his waist and it came up as 36. He decided to try these shorts, and he found that if he sucked in his stomach he could get them fastened. He put on a plain black formal belt to hold the button so that it didn't pop off. He would have put on his silver studded belt, but he couldn't find it anywhere. He hadn't worn this belt since his great aunts wedding last summer, and it was a bit snug, but it would do.
11321.title: The next day he has trouble putting his shorts on

info.brief_description: Characters from the Disney channel series start to get fat!
info.description:
Characters from the Disney series "zeke and Luther" gain weight and get fatter.
RULES:-
MALE weight gain ONLY
NO female weight gain (females can be in the story, but keep the gaining for the guys).
All male characters wear belts.
Sweat pants, jogging bottoms, whatever you want to call them, are NOT allowed in this story.
No "suddenly he woke up and he was 99999999 pounds!"
Males must measure their waist size as well as weight.
Try to keep weights to a sensible amount
HAVE FUN!!!
